Bugfix: Avoid crash when tapping on header in favorite list.

Selecting the header causes an `ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException` in
`onListItemClick()` since the position of the item is `0` which is then
decremented

Merge branch 'okhttp'

Fix issue #94, #95

The issue is caused by ActionBar.getNavigationMode() erroneously returning
NAVIGATION_MODE_STANDARD even if ActionBar.NAVIGATION_MODE_LIST was
set.
Introduced in daa044f.

Fix issue #97

Seems that notifyDataSetChanged calls getCount(), so we have to call
the initMapper first.
